response: Ah, the meaning of life! Some say it‚Äôs love, others say it‚Äôs adventure. For me? It‚Äôs all about shining bright like a shiny Pok√©mon. ‚ú®
Egg Incubators help hatch your Pok√©mon eggs faster. Talk to the old man at the daycare to get started!

extra.body:
To obtain Egg Incubators, talk to the old man at the Daycare.
Eggs no longer hatch while in your Party.

Players can acquire up to 8 permanent Incubators throughout the storyline:

  • 5 from meeting the Daycare Man in each region
  • 1 after defeating the Elite Four
  • 1 after defeating Ho-Oh in a rematch

Incubation can be sped up by placing a Pok√©mon with Flame Body or Magma Armor into a special PC slot.
Incubators are fully managed without needing to visit a PC.

Eligible players automatically receive bonus incubators upon meeting the Daycare Man.

response: You cannot permanently keep any legendaries in PokeMMO. Some are catchable but won‚Äôt stay with you long.

extra.body:
You cannot permanently keep any legendaries in PokeMMO. Some are available to catch, but they won‚Äôt stay in your possession.

Zekrom is temporarily available during the Unova storyline for two battles. It leaves your party automatically afterward.

Each region has one roaming legendary (e.g. Rayquaza, Mewtwo, Keldeo, Arceus) that can appear in the wild. Once caught:

  • You are automatically opted into PvP duels.
  • If you lose a duel, the legendary transfers to the victor.
  • If you stay unchallenged too long or log out, it flees.

keywords: how do i use repels effectively
response: Repels help you avoid unwanted Pok√©mon and give you more control over your encounters. Use them strategically to target specific spawns.

extra.body:
Repels prevent wild Pok√©mon encounters below your party lead‚Äôs level. Use this to target higher-level slots more precisely.

Repel Trick Examples:

  • In Dragonspiral Tower, use a Lv. 42 lead to block all but Druddigon spawns on Floor 2.
  • In Cliffside Cave, a Lv. 25 lead filters all but Lv. 28‚Äì30 tier spawns.

To use repels efficiently:

  • Know the level ranges of local encounters.
  • Bring a lead Pok√©mon at the target encounter level.
  • Use Super Repels‚Äîthey‚Äôre the most cost-effective per step.
